name: Corner Social
address: 321 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10027, USA

reviews.text: Our server JESSICA was amazing and made my birthday so special!!!!!!  She is fantastic!
Had the most amazing experience with Jessica as our server. Food was amazing. Came here after cheering for the NYCM. Jessica made the experience exceptional.

Went there on a saturday and the DJ was giving away free drinks for guessing P Diddy songs and I saw a small roach crawl around the bar. Hard pass. Been there before and its good to be around other black people but really at what cost? Smh.
Tr√®s sympa pour boire un verre et grignoter un bout.DJ qui anime!
Nice crowd, good vibes.....I could have done without the DJ cutting the songs as you start to vibe.
Visiting NY staying at an Airbnb in this area and this restaurant was so cute, fun, and good! The staff was incredibly friendly and had great food/drink suggestions.
Fantastic food, great vibe, and excellent service ‚Äî all at a very reasonable price. I‚Äôll definitely be back!‚Äù

This spot is amazing.. When i‚Äôm in the neighborhood I stop in to grab a drink or talk to the staff. They are patient, professional and accommodating.  Kudos to the management team.       Also i love to see celebrities low key in the corner - enjoying the vibes ‚Ä¶
This is a phenomenal establishment. I can‚Äôt wait to go back. Sir P
Jess is the Best! She made sure my sis had an amazing birthday celebration! So attentive, very great energy!

Didn't order food but I ordered drinks and JESSICA was on point

Never had to look for her, she was extremely attentive and also so professional while being fun.

Thank her for an amazing experience!
Server was amazing.
Jessica is the best!

I always have a good time at corner Social.  The music  Is always boppin.   As long as I‚Äôve been coming here, I just learned a happy hour - $10 Apps and drinks.  However, a happy hour food is only worth it if you‚Äôre getting a deal. The wings are regular price there‚Äôs just fewer of them- For for $10 when a full order is six for 15.  A real deal would be to have AT LEAST 5 Five wings for $10.  I still enjoy it here, but maybe give people a deal. It‚Äôs hard out here today.
Been coming here for years, it‚Äôs always a good vibe. Food and drinks are good too. Shouts to Alex! He‚Äôs been with Corner Social a long time!

Jose was amazing and very attentive, we never had to worry about where he was. It was my friends birthday he got the dj to get us a shout out! Never complained or anything he was super sweet. The food was ok but the happy hour menu is perfect and gonna get you a buzz for cheap
Had an amazing experience! Jessica was exceptional and went out of her way to be attentive and kind. Can't wait to come back.
10/10 service this place is amazing been here for 10 years and it gets better. Jessica is amazing come see her will continue to come here
Jessica was Amazing!!!!! Will be back!!!
Always a stellar experience!
Great vibes and food was delicious. Jessica was an amazing server!! Attentive and friendly!
Jessica was our server and she was the sweetest. Super kind and accommodating, 10/10 recommend if she‚Äôs working your table!
Went to to brunch.  Wonderful vibes and food. I would definitely recommend.  Ask for Jessica.  She was great n took care of us
Came to brunch and it was lit! Jessica was our server and she took great care of us! Can‚Äôt wait to come back

My girls and I went for lunch and had the pleasure of meeting Jessica, an absolute gem. I can‚Äôt wait to come back. Everything about this place and the atmosphere is incredible. 10/10 service. Food is affordable. Drinks are a 10. Come check it out.

This place 10/10 Jessica the queen was amazing as always very attentive, and great at her job ,come here for any celebration!!! Food and drinks are absolutely satisfying. CRAIG is a Fabulous manager with obvious longevity in what he does.
Jessica was awesome very vibrant energy
Jessica took care of me and my family and we had a good time
Jessica took care of me and I have a good time ‚ù§Ô∏èü•≥‚Ä¶
Jessica is one of the most warm and friendly servers I‚Äôve ever had! She was extremely attentive. I live in the neighborhood and will always be back to request her!
Jessica was our server. She was AMAZING. the best service- so helpful and so kind. ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è

Corner Social is a must-visit! The atmosphere is vibrant, the food is delicious, and the service was outstanding. Jessica made our experience exceptional, friendly, attentive, and genuinely welcoming. Highly recommend stopping by if you‚Äôre in the area!
This place ‚Ä¶ not what it use to be
Went in a Wednesday. Better days to go are Friday and Saturday.
LOVEEEE!!!

Come here with my sister after a holiday Parade around 5 PM. If it‚Äôs serve with black lobster and underwhelm OK best, I was concerned that they asked to leave because my four year-old daughter fell asleep at our table, even though we ordered over $300. Service is not good, food is over, and they had a competition towards family with small children. Not soccer.
The service in this place is so trash why the attitude if you don‚Äôt want to work call out or quit
Wonderful ambiance and staff. I'll definitely be back the next time I'm in New York.
Drinks were great. Will eat the next time here.

Una muy buena experiencia si quieres disfrutar de comida local en un ambiente incre√≠ble. Dj pinchando m√∫sica y mucho ambiente de gente cenando y tomando copas. Sin lugar a dudas una opci√≥n muy recomendable si quieres disfrutar del ambiente genuino de Harlem

Menjar delici√≥s. Atenci√≥ excel¬∑lent i un ambient incre√Øble.
Molt recomanable.
Muy buen ambiente con gente muy agradable! Una estancia verdaderamente fant√°sticaü´∂üèª
Cool vibe
Jessica was so friendly, helpful and kept coming back. She was very attentive and focused on her the customer‚Äôs need. Great experience Juaquin and jessica made this experience like no other.
I love the service . My colleagues and I came for brunch and we were greeted with amazing service from Jessica. She was amazing and proceeded to take to our needs.

To be fair, the attention Jessica has provided to me and my team has been amazing.

Thank you Jessica
Jessica was amazing!!!! I loved the service
Jessica was AMAZING ! She took great care of us and was super efficient. ‚ò∫Ô∏è
JESSICA IS THE BOMB üí£ üí£üí£!!!!!!! Trust me when I tell you to ask for her!!! She took care of us and it felt like she was a friend. Very personable.

First off I love Harlem period. But I really loved the vibe at the Corner Social. The DJ/music...on point. My steak...on point. My drinks (the Harlem Sage)...on point. Loved the energy of the whole place. Highly recommend reviewers to stop by. We went in around 5pm on a Sat and left around 730pm. There was a nice crowd even then. We heard it got livelier around 10 but we had to head to BK that night...if not we would have hung around longer or came back for sure. I most definitely will be returning to the Corner Social on my next visit back to NYC. *UPDATE 2025* Just FYI still love Harlem still love Corner Social. Years later they still got it!!! Always cool vibes when I visit. Period.

My cousin and I came here for dinner last week. I had been 1 other time about 6 years ago and remember it fondly. This time, it did not disappoint. We ordered rum-based drinks, and she got the steak with collars and mashed potatoes while I enjoyed the salmon burger with fries and a side of brussel sprouts. The food was excellent, and our server, Jose, was magnificent. The music and ambiance were stellar. Thank you for a great dinner experience!

I went there to celebrate a friend's birthday. We were well cared for by our waitress.  The DJ had us rocking on the floor the whole time. It was a good vibe. Food was tasty and in good portion. We were all happy.

2nd time dining at Corner Social. Wanted to take my husband after the 1st dining here with my best friend. The food and drinks were delicious, and the ambiance and music were amazing. Same for my 2nd visit except for the shrimp and grits. The first time I ordered it, it was great. No complaints. The 2nd time during this visit, the grits were so lumpy and hard like they were sitting or rushed. I would still return because it's a great vibe, and I love the food options. Just note that the shrimp and grits are hit or miss.

I enjoyed visiting Corner Social last night and can't say enough good things about my experience! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere that instantly made me feel at home. The establishment was impeccably clean, which added to the overall pleasant ambiance.

One of the highlights of my visit was the fantastic music playing throughout the venue. It set the tone for a fun and lively evening, making it impossible not to enjoy myself. The DJ played everything, and I mean everything, from R&B to merengue to dembow and others!

I was particularly impressed by the selection of drinks available. Whether you're in the mood for a classic cocktail or something more adventurous, Corner Social has something for everyone.

A bonus was the welcoming demeanor of the security staff at the entrance. He ensured everyone felt safe and comfortable while maintaining a friendly atmosphere.

Corner Social is a gem of a place that perfectly balances a fun vibe, excellent service, and a great environment. I can't wait to return!

Went on a Sunday after church...amazing atmosphere and great live music!
The food was delicious and the service impeccable.

Food+ music + drinks (Top tier)

Definitely a great spot to socialize , watch the game and listen to music . The food was also very good .

This was such a fun place. While it is a bit loud, the vibe is amazing. They had a DJ in Saturday night, and he played great music. The food was way better than bar food. I had the fried chicken sandwich, and my husband had the chicken and waffles and Brussels sprouts. We will for sure return!

Jessica was fantastic! My friends and I came to celebrate my birthday, and it couldn‚Äôt have been a better experience. She was attentive, friendly, and made sure everything was perfect. The food was absolutely delicious, the drinks were amazing, and the atmosphere made for an unforgettable night. We had such a great time and will definitely be coming back!

I was in Harlem for an event on Saturday so I decided to stop by just for cocktails and tapas. The ambience was great 10/10. Noise level 8/10. Service 10/10. However, I was really disappointed with the food and beverage 3/10. The food lacked seasoning,  it was very bland to the point that the only thing I ate was the french fries I ordered a mango Margarita that was utterly disgusting. It seems like they just poured drink in a glass with ice and added a dash of tequila. That was very upsetting to me because I was looking forward to something tasty to wake up my taste buds. I most likely will not return.

I had an amazing time here celebrating my birthday at brunch. Jessica was my server and she was amazing! She was so personable and always had a smile on her face. She made me feel so welcome and she had the best recommendations. You can tell she is happy to be there and makes you feel the same way with her good energy. Go visit Jessica on your next visit here! She made my time memorable.

The food was great as always. Our server was amazing!!! The vibe and music for brunch was exceptional, hence why I keep coming back. I‚Äôm rating two stars because the very unfriendly and nasty behavior towards us from the hostess. She made a whole ordeal and caused a scene all because we asked to be sat away from the door, which we had no issue waiting for another table to become available if the larger tables were for lager parties. As someone who‚Äôs managed restaurant for three years and who frequents this restaurant whenever in this side of town, her behavior was distasteful and not at the level of someone who should be working as the main point of contact for customers. I hope the next time I visit if she‚Äôs there her behavior would have been corrected to meet the standard of hospitality.

Corner social is a nice vibe! We went there on a whim for Saturday brunch around 12:30pm. There was already quite a few people there, but we were seated immediately without a reservation. You can order from the brunch menu or appetizers from the regular menu. They have a nice selection. We ordered the burrito and chicken & waffles. The burrito was pretty good, could have been seasoned a bit more. The chicken & waffles were good. The chicken was well seasoned and the waffles were soft. The mimosas were $25 for a bottle (they mix it in advance) or $9 for individual mimosas. They were pretty strong! Definitely got the job done. Everything came out quickly and the service was good. The dj played a mix of r&b music and was interactive with the guests. He even does a free drink on the hour. I‚Äôd definitely return.
Server spilled lit candle on my skirt and $1500 shoes. All I got was a ‚Äúsorry‚Äù and soda water to try and get it out of my clothes myself, which also didn‚Äôt work.

The vibe to the food is really good.
Always ordering something different off the menu every time I go. Only thing is sometimes on some days I guess it is a bit of a wait. I had brunch and on another girls night out had some dinner

My Family & I stumbled upon Corner Social on our way to another destination.  We arrived during Happy Hour & ordered the Harlem Love Punch, Spinach Dip & Chicken & Waffles & Lamb Burger. Loved the spinach dip & drinks. The rest of the food was good but could've been seasoned better for flavor. Nice food presentation, service & atmosphere.  We enjoyed ourselves!

well. me and my sister usually go to corner social every Tuesday because it‚Äôs such a vibe. We always get the calamari and the mussels with the white wine but after this experience, unfortunately we cannot go back. We decided to save money this day and only sit at the bar for the very first time and just order some drinks and literally a water bug appeared out of nowhere. We let the waiter and know they did not care. They just looked at me like I was crazy and just let the bug roam around didn‚Äôt try to catch it or nothing. I understand that we are in New York but the way that the waiter acted was as if this is a normal occurrence unfortunately, I will not be returning.
Fast bartenders with smiles, great dj, fun atmosphere,friendly patrons, delicious food. Owners support community  artists home of Planet Harlem wall mural

We waited about 45 minutes at the bar for a table. On this particular Sunday (not sure if this is the norm) the tables were all reserved and we were informed that they hold tables for 15 minutes after calling the party. We were added to the waiting list and eventually a table became available. The food was good (had wings (dry rub) and a Caesar Salad). My recommendation would be to make reservations in advance. It was busy this Sunday and they also had a live DJ, really nice spot in Harlem.

The fried chicken and waffles were fried perfectly. The flavor was perfect. The cutlet and the crust were both seasoned well. The mac and cheese was also tasty but soupy and artificial. The jerk chicken wings were delicious. I do not recommend the crab cakes as they were small and not filled with lump meat, instead tuna like meat.

First time here & will definitely return. Came on a packed Friday night and the staff was pleasant. Our server Francisco was attentive and gave great recommendations. Food was good; Calamari needed to be crispier. DJ was on point!
Went there twice for drinks and on both occasions had great cocktails and found a great atmosphere. Just off the 135 st subway station.  Check out the mural next door to it.

My husband came here last minute because it was close to an event we had just finished and boy am I glad we came. The music, atmosphere, and FOOD was great! 10/10 recommend. I am a meat eater but the black bean veggie  burger called my attention and it exceeded my expectations.

The atmosphere is a bar/club but the food is way better than that. I loved the vibe, music, and the food. The only downside was my Mama's Chicken sandwich; I wished the chicken was an actual thick juicy fried chicken breast sandwich but instead is a pounded out thin piece which made it very dry. My wife's curry rice, chicken dish however, was very good as was my lobster bisque. The DJ was great and played some great dance music.

Corner Social is always a vibe. The food is good the music is good and I like the area. It's great to go before you head out to a lounge or before the Shrine üåö I do wish there was a dance floor though just to separate everyone dancing

Sigh 3 stars  is not reflective of the restaurant but of my experience for that dinner.
Food was delicious, pretty good white sangria, place clean + beautiful, music good... would definitely go back!
Problem was my waiter and the check. He was soooooo slow and absent. Saw him once when we got our waters 15mins after being seated, then to bring the food menu (no drink menu provided), then to take orders, then to bring the food, then to bring a wrong check with 20% gratuity added. That's it. No water refills, no asking if everything is OK, no asking about drinks, and then a check with extra appetizers and a 20% tip! The waiter at a nearby table was far more helpful and it would be a 5 star review if he was responsible for us. He was the one who brought the right check to us (still with 20% tip) because our waiter did not come back until I put my card on the check.
Would definitely go back and sit in a different section, I'm sure I can update this review then to a higher rating.
Loved the food and vibes here. Service was nice too. Can be quite loud inside though. Sit outside if you don‚Äôt want to yell to talk

Corner Social is such a gem in the neighborhood.
I went during Saturday Brunch so they had a DJ. They had an interactive ‚Äúname that song‚Äù game with a free drink as a prize.
Great ambiance. The staff was incredibly attentive. Our server was Genesis. Another employee, Jeritza, was walking around with her beautiful head of curls, checking in on every party. Just making sure that everything was okay. This touch set Corner Social apart in my mind.
On to the food-
I ordered the Chicken Bacon Waffle - the chicken was juicy, well seasoned and the bacon was crispy. The waffle could use some work. It was very soft but still tasted good.
My friend ordered the steak and eggs. She ate it but noted that the steak was chewy, the eggs had too much moisture and the bread was the best part of the dish due to the butter.
The mimosa bottle was large enough for multiple servings for 2 people and tasted great.
I highly recommend corner social. It is a good spot to socialize, have some nice drinks and good food.

The waitress Jessica was Amazing she made my first experience amazing she was so vibrant and nice! She‚Äôs the reason why I plan on coming back again shes quick and efficient but mostly friendly and a great person if you guys haven‚Äôt hit this place up after a long day after work please put it on your schedule also the music has a great 90‚Äôs early 2000‚Äôs vibe !!!!!

Great spot, love the food it was very tasteful and drinks were on point as well. The  atmosphere is very cool with great throwback music. It can get crowded and cluttered but on the weekdays it's good.

Divine the hosted was awesome and friendly made sure we got seated right away and even let us choose our table that was available near the window instead of sitting us in the center where we was originally suppose to sit - that was a super plus. A++

Our server was friendly and down to earth as well. Our food was great. The lamb chops were very good enjoyed them, chicken avocado sandwich was great not dry at all, chicken quesadillas had flavor as well. Overall was great I was satisfied.

For the first time going I was truly impressed honestly. Had a great time.

Jessica was our waitress and she was beyond amazing. She exceeded our expectations for dining in and give us a great first time experience. Thank you Jessica and thank you corner social for great food, service and music!!

This is a reliable neighborhood spot that is very chill and friendly. My lamb shank, lychee martini and bread pudding were delicious. The frozen espresso martini was okay if you do not like sweet drinks. Great service as well.

The meal and atmosphere were both fine, but the service was very slow and not responsive. We waited a long time to receive drinks, have our orders taken, receive the check, pretty much everything. For a small place, they should be able to‚Ä¶

Was just here yesterday 10/13/17. Had a wonderful experience at this excellent establishment! Friendly staff, very welcoming and attentive! The crowd was mixed, the food was spot on, the drinks were super strong and their Happy Hour was on point!

I‚Äôll definitely be returning! I‚Äôm a very satisfied customer, and highly recommend The Corner Social!
